attributes.review: So I got this app to bow down to our mighty orange ✨fascist✨. Don’t get me wrong, I love this app, however that night when I was sleeping our dear president came into my house and KIDNAPPED me. When I woke up I had a mind control device on my head and was being forced to say “Trump is love, Trump is life” over and over while being forcefed Cheeto Puffs. Long story short, I’m now braindead and haven’t seen my family in 15 years.
attributes.title: Good app, however I was kidnapped.

attributes.review:
DISGUSTING 
If I could do no stars I would.
I 𝐡𝐚𝐭𝐞 this app. I was just trying to educate myself and then BAM I’m appalled by what I saw! 
Why do I have to put my phone number in????
That makes no sense and is an invasion of my privacy! I don’t want to get all of those stupid text messages! 
I’ll end up just as glued to my phone as my children! 
Who knows maybe if I’m on my phone too much I’ll start to read other articles. Then I could get another point of view!! 
That would be DEVASTATING I site do hope they fix this. 
I can’t believe our very own sexist racist homophobic transphobic president would do this! 
It almost makes me want to change the whole government system since it is CLEARLY CORRUPT!

✨🧚🏻I went on this app hoping to find some good things about trump 2020 but this app took sooooo long to download that I was left with nothing for three whole weeks! I can’t believe we have to deal with a president like this smh smh smh. I had such high hopes but when the app finally downloaded the quality of the app just baffled me. There’s literally nothing of use here and it’s just a waste of your time 🧚🏻✨
attributes.title: Nasty nasty 🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded this app with high hopes of it educating me on the facts of what Donald J. Trump will be doing in the so called “future” of this country, sadly I could not have seen that information because of how clustered the app was and very hard to navigate. As the so called “future” maybe try making to app a little better so I can see if we even have one while your running it. Much love 🥰
attributes.title: Not very appealing to anyone 😚

attributes.review: i just downloaded the app and i can already see the errors and problems from it. when you open the app it’s just disgusting and rude, because they put the wrong flag behind him. also this app took up so much storage and i have unlimited. and to even think that they started ringing my phone every 55 seconds (i timed) i rude. i heard there making a new update where it hacks your phone. DO NOT LET ANYONE DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS IS TOXIC - TRUMPET PLAYING TRUMP
attributes.title: 🚨BORDERLINE DISRESPECTFUL🚨

attributes.review: i opened this app. it was a little bit laggy, nothing to think of right? just needs to be used a little bit right? WRONG! it made my phone crash. i can’t use specific apps anymore like safari google maps and instagram?! as soon as i tried to open my apps it opened but it wouldn’t let me do ANYTHING! if i could give this a 0 star i definitely would
attributes.title: This is horrible

attributes.review: IDownload the app and this was the worst app ever I was just gonna see what his plans were so and then I really don't know what to say about this app it is the worst app ever nobody should download this I couldn't even move it out of my home page where you could like do other stuff on your home page on your phone I couldn't move it out of my phone so good luck guys if you downloaded this app
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Not only did this app take AGES to download but it kept asking me for personal information. Then all of a sudden it started to glitch and erased all of my other apps! I can’t even open the app anymore without it crashing. Absolutely horrible, you would think that an app for the President would actually work. So disappointed and dissatisfied, don’t even try to download it. 😗✌🏻
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: I recently started drinking Lysol so that I could prepare my immune system for corona since daddy orange said it was the cure and I also got my entire family on it! I decided to download trumps app so that I can keep up with the factual information that he provides us with and to my dismay, when I opened the app my house set on fire and my dog started vomiting Cheetos everywhere it was crazy!! Because of this experience I’ve decided to vote for Kanye!
attributes.title: AHHH

attributes.review: This app sent a virus to my phone and now it constantly plays Replay by Iyaz at maximum volume. It’s been playing for 10 days straight now and the sound is now attracting cats to my house. I have about 67 cats in my front yard and it’s all because of this horrible app. Oh and the app promotes racism because our ✨cheeto president✨is a white supremacist. He’s also trying to silence Gen Z which will never happen. We will not stop.
attributes.title: the worst app ever 👁👄👁
